content: I'm working on documenting the inline-const feature, but I'm not sure where I need to document it. Do I just need to do the unstable book or do I need to add a section in the reference as well?

I don't think the reference tries to keep up with the changes to unstable features as they happen.

It's good to have a PR ready for the reference as part of stabilizing something, but doesn't need to exist for unstable.
